value:
My family had too many mouths to
feed when I was a kid, so I left. I
joined some mercs for the pay.

Fódlan and now Askr both prove that
where people gather, schemes follow.
There's no light without dark...

You've been sluggish lately. Get some
rest and don't let me catch you off
guard again.

I don't avoid unsavory company. To
understand someone, you have to
see the world through their eyes.

I've made a living tracking down and
taking out targets. That won't change
anytime soon.

I'm working, so I'll keep this short.
$Nf says hello.

I've far and away exceeded the terms
of our agreement. I'll return later
to collect.

I've trained to control my breathing
and mask my presence. I'm good, but
I could always be better.

I faltered in a moment of weakness.
I...I saw an insect on the battlefield.

You trust me to use this on my
missions? I appreciate the vote
of confidence.

The name's Shamir. Does everyone
here dress like this? Never mind.
I'll wear it, as long as I get paid.

What's the point of this outfit? It
hasn't helped me in battle, but it
hasn't hindered my work either.$k$pI suppose it doesn't matter, as long as
I get paid. I'm not usually picky about
jobs I take, but this place isn't ideal.$k$pIt could use some more level-headed
Heroes who don't follow the royals
and nobles with blind zeal.$k$pYou think I want to leave? Are you
thick? I want to stay and help make
that change. I won't say it again.
はっ
逃がすか！
くっ…
ちくしょう…
It's you or me.
Just doing my job.
Caught you off guard.
Accept your fate.
I'm...better than this.
ふう
I've been told that this is what ninja wear. It might take some getting used to.
I warned you against that before, didn't I?
I understand that ninja specialize in undercover operations behind enemy lines.
This gear is different from what I'm used to, but I'll make it work.
Everyone is distracted by the festival. Should make my job much easier.
I'm prepared to take on most any job, for the right price.
You should keep your distance if you plan to leave in one piece.
Understood.
Tell me where.
I'll settle this.
